options.betterpingdisplay.autoColorPingT: Whether to color a player's ping based on their latency.
E.g, low latency = green, high latency = red
options.betterpingdisplay.renderPingBars: Whether to also draw the default Minecraft ping bars
The ping text color to use.
It only works when the auto-color ping text is turned off
options.betterpingdisplay.pingTextFormat: The format string for ping text.
Must include a `%d`, which will be replaced
dynamically by the actual ping value.
